story_teamflare_02_04000/2401_1001_0100_: Based on the rumors, it should be around here...
story_teamflare_02_04000/2401_1001_0200_:
I wonder where that Pokémon you were talking
about is.
story_teamflare_02_04000/2401_1001_0300_:
They say it’s invisible, so we have to
search carefully...
story_teamflare_02_04000/2401_1001_0400_:
Maybe it’s better to search with our ears than
our eyes!
story_teamflare_02_04000/2401_1001_0500_: I won’t miss a Pokémon’s footsteps!
story_teamflare_02_04000/2401_1001_0600_:
If we all search carefully, we should be able to
find it, even if we can’t see it!
story_teamflare_02_04000/2401_1001_0800_:
You have each found your special ways to interact
with Pokémon through your journeys in Kalos!
story_teamflare_02_04000/2401_1001_0900_:
If you all work together, there’s no Pokémon
you can’t—
story_teamflare_02_04000/2401_1001_1100_: What is this? I can’t see in front of me!
story_teamflare_02_04000/2401_1001_1400_:
They’re battling a Pokémon I haven’t seen before...
Could that be?!
story_teamflare_02_04000/2401_1001_1600_: Hm? Why are you all here?
